pageContext.title: Textual Embodiments: 2017 Society for Textual Scholarship Conference
pageContext.description_excerpt: In May 2017, MITH and the African American Digital Humanities Initiative (AADHum) are hosting "Textual Embodiments," the Society for Textual Scholarship's 2017 International Interdisciplinary Conference.
pageContext.participants: Catherine Knight Steele, Neil Fraistat, Purdom Lindblad, Raffaele Viglianti, Stephanie Sapienza
